resources.string: WALT reports protocol version %1$s, which is not supported. Please program WALT to a firmware with protocol version %2$s. To do this from the app, choose "Reprogram" from the "Clock sync" menu.

WALT is designed to measure the latency of physical sensors and outputs on phones and computers. It can currently perform the following measurements: tap latency, drag latency (scroll), screen draw latency, audio output/microphone latencies, and MIDI input/output latencies.
DISCLAIMER: This is not an official Google product.
A WALT device is required to run the latency tests. For more information, visit github.com/google/walt
